entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed 'compCanHavePatchpoints()' during 'Importation' #73090
    7.0.0
  • CodeGen constructor called with invalid theCompiler argument #73089
    7.0.0
  • MethodSignature undefined use of reference binding to null pointer type (per gcc -fsanitize=undefined) #73088
  • .NET 7.0 preview DragEnter bug after update to latest versions. #73084
  • NativeAOT xml support has to be able to understand cecil format for types #73083
    7.0.0
  • mono ARM64 llvmfullaot builds are often timing out #73081
  • AOT Release shared library does not respect override methods #73076
  • Convert.ChangeType does not work with DateOnly #73074
  • Spilling does not work for some multi-reg nodes #73070
    8.0.0
  • Huge memory consumption by process "wasm-opt" when publishing aot .net 7 preview 6 #73069
  • FileStream creates a file in incorrect folder, when starting as UNC path #73075
  • [QUIC] Add support for SslCertificateTrust #73053
    Future
  • Stack traces should include parameter names #73051
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IServiceCollection.Configure<T>(Action<T, IServiceProvider>) #73050
  • linux ThreadWaitReason Unknown #73049
  • Dataflow analysis lockup compiling System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #73048
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: QuicListener not reporting address in use correctly #73045
  • undefined behavior detected by runtime as compiled by g++-12 -fsanitize=undefined #73043
  • Attempting to JIT compile in Full AOT mode ExecutionEngineException failing tests in CI #73041
  • interop work item #73040
  • system.collections.concurrent.tests failed in CI #73038
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.sh #73034
  • WriteAllBytesAsync throws an exception : The process cannot access the file #73047

Closed

  • Type test for ref struct is incorrect #73096
  • Excessive memory usage while working with X509Certificate (Linux, NET 5 and NET Core 3.1). #55672
    7.0.0
  • Possible memory leak in ECDiffieHellmanOpenSsl #57528
    7.0.0
  • [LinuxBionic][CI] `System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest` failing #72995
  • [MongoDB.Driver] some methods throw exception after native compiler #70400
    7.0.0
  • Support catch(T) in shared code #67806
    7.0.0
  • Source generators are introducing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis prebuilts in source-build #71741
    7.0.0
  • [Docs] Windows build requirements - external tools vs. VS components #55629
    7.0.0
  • [Test][Infra] See how many tests were run in a specific lane #53191
    7.0.0
  • Update ConvertToLibraryImport analyzer and fixer to limit false-positives/code breaks #72883
    7.0.0
  • Can't build on latest main #55833
    7.0.0
  • Memory usage when using Mailkit in containers #57213
    Future
  • XxHash incremental versions not processing stripe when filling holdback exactly. #69184
  • Issues with the Crc32 intrinsic in the Jit #62692
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json instances of polymorphic types emit type discriminator when serialized as `object` types #72187
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] crash on unix-arm64 in TestSimpleGenericRecursion__RecurseOverClass #72966
    7.0.0
  • Call stack incomplete on Linux in .NET 7 preview 1 #65822
    7.0.0
  • fgMakeOutgoingStructArgCopy incorrectly calls incRefCnts #6044
    Future
  • [wasm] implement `JSImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72760
    7.0.0
  • Avoid copy of buffer in implementation of JsonSerializer.ReadValue #29952
    Future
  • .NET 7 interface INumberBuilder #73062
  • Compiler error when publishing a blazor wasm (MonoAOTCompiler: Unable to compile method 'bool System.DateTimeParse:Lex) #69671
    7.0.0
  • OCSP stapling support can be used to optimize TLS connections #33377
    7.0.0
  • JSON source generator fails with recursive collection type graphs #66421
    7.0.0
  • Blazor hosted app gets compile warnings of call unavailable in the browser but no warning of calls that may not be supported in a docker container #72513
    Future
  • Ensure JsonSerializer / source generator works well with required members #70945
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Linq.Expression interpreter tests crashing in Linux-ARM64 #70012
    7.0.0
  • Implement committed_by_oh_per_heap #36828
    Future
  • Fix per object heap commit tracking for regions #71790
    7.0.0
  • Apparent heap corruption in crossgen2 on NativeAOT Arm64 Linux #72831
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: Ephemeral port and connection already in use #73036
  • There are circumstances where ListEquality is broken on net7.0 #72845
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bring back live host change #73095
  • Fix xxHash64 handling of large (> 4GB) inputs #73093
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove buffer copying from Utf8JsonReader Deserialize methods. #73092
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1912601 #73091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support TraceSource to be initialized from the app.config file #73087
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assert in NativeAOT when handling data flow on compiler generated… #73085
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update zlib, zlib-intel dependencies #73082
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Move System.ValueType.s_seed into System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeHelpers #73080
    community-contribution
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't exclude .gz files from assets.zip #73077
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add some QuicListener tests #73072
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wip][wasm] deprecate legacy JS API and propose new #73068
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Don't hardcode /tmp in named pipe tests, it's not for us on Android #73067
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Skip .mibc profile methods when not found #73066
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.NarrowUtf16ToAscii to x-plat intrinsics #73064
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • JSON support required properties #73063
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • #73041 exclude Microsoft.CSharp.Tests for tvOS #73061
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Disallow return buffer aliasing for unmanaged calls #73059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement new API GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #73057
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, CoreClr
  • Add support for X509ChainPolicy for QUIC #73056
    area-System.Net
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • DRAFT: Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add retry to symlink test #73042
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Collect crash dumps for aborting on Unix #73037
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Assertion prop instrumentation #73035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Appropriately free temporary values on EC import #73078
    area-System.Security
  • Disable NJulianRuleTest on Android #73030
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Add EH filters for generic catch(T) blocks #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add stateful marshaller support to the CustomMarshallerAttributeAnalyzer #72888
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Update ConvertToLibraryImport analyzer and fixer to limit false-positives/code breaks #72965
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix crc32 issues found in #62692 #73005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor root-level serialization logic and polymorphic value handling. #72789
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] recursive generic fix for ARM64 #73071
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] `JSImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72996
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one #73065
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix assert in Thread.SpinWait(0) #73033
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1911466 #73028
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-enable tests for #66421 #73052
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm-ep] diagnostic server IPC fixups #72859
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix UnsupportedOSPlatformAttribute usage in System.Net.NetworkInformation.cs #72792
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make JSON support required properties #72937
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Unblock tests blocked on 70012 #73044
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implementation of opcode OP_GC_SAFE_POINT for ppc64le #72997
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Run more test on NativeAOT Linux #72832
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Get more libraries tests running with NativeAOT #72917
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Disqualify methods with modifiable `this` from OSR. #72877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #72258
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Annotate System.Linq.Queryable with RDC #72899
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Descriptor parser support #72975
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947
  • Add more DataFlow tests from linker to NativeAOT #72777
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Make IHostEnvironment.ApplicationName non-nullable #72945
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add the ability to load a PKCS10 into CertificateRequest #73023
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Remove ActiveIssue tag in ThreadPoolBoundHandle_IntegrationTests.netcoreapp.cs #72973
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix "command is not pending" #72953
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add documentation for hot/cold splitting #73029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Create a method to compare previous frames on call stack for firefox #73000
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [eventpipe] Use MonoImage:module_name when filename is NULL #73018
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono, 7.0.0
  • Move format.py script and use retrying download #72993
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Avoid removing multi-use boxes #73014
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Unix: Move 'FileNotFound to DirectoryNotFound' handling to GetExceptionForIoErrno. #70661
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][draft] re-try downloading assets #72933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] CreateSymbolicLink PInvoke retval must be marshalled as U1 #73004
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.9
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.Year/.Month/.Day/.DayOfYear` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixed a WKS specific issue by not clobbering the heap_segment_saved_allocated #72923
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [android][debugger] Fix infinite recursion and null pointer access while debugging #73024
    area-Debugger-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Static class #1896
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix R2RDump to support dumping hot-cold parts together #1908

Updated

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Support splitting on ARM64 #1946

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixes to R2RDump to dump respective hot/cold parts together #1945

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] Add MSBuild task to run API Compat standalone #18677
    7.0.1xx

Updated

  • Allow projects to control which configuration is used by default when publishing #26534
    Backlog
  • Can't update packages NU1007 : runtime.json could not be found #26551
  • Allow dotnet publish to use --runtimes #26584
    Discussion
  • UseCommonOutputDirectory=true breaks CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies flag #23342
  • dotnet build --framework builds referenced project twice #26690
  • dotnet build does not run without sudo #10553
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Fix package installer tests #26843
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default + Add PublishSelfContained #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] Get PublishRelease working in .csproj #26808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stop double copying all of the watch and format files. #26811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Replace unscoped with UnscopedRefAttribute #6329

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Type test for ref struct is incorrect #63085
  • Auto add async to method signature feature improvement #63081
  • [Feature request]auto remove generic correspondent angle brackets #63080
  • Move argument name hints to top of argument instance [C#] #63079
  • Remove or reduce use of `ParameterSymbol.DeclaredScope` #63078
  • C# Automatic String Interpolation Syntax "$" #63077
  • Display inherited comments #63075
  • Peek Implementation for interfaces #63074
  • Add optional argument name code style #63073
  • About automatic formatting commas #63072
  • Display tooltips for doc comments that don't have summary tags #63071
  • Mark parameter from metadata with ScopedRefAttribute and UnscopedRefAttribute as invalid #63070
    17.4
  • Report error for `[UnscopedRef] scoped` parameter #63057
  • [API proposal]: GetDeclaredSymbol for lambdas #63051
    17.4
  • "Disabled" severity in EditorConfig UI doesn't work #63050
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.TabTabCompletionWithArguments #63043
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpSquigglesNetCore.VerifySyntaxErrorSquiggles #63042
    17.4
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicErrorListNetCore.ErrorList #63041
    17.4
  • Checksum algorithm set by `GeneratorContexts.AddSource` should be overridden by `/checksumalgorithm` switch #63039
    17.4

Closed

  • Find all references that might change its value #63076
  • Value tracking continues to work after closing solution or even changing solution #59423
    17.3
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found #62719
  • CS0305 compiler error false trigger? #63053

PullRequests

Created

  • Put correct function call for Return Attributes #63084
    Area-IDE
  • Handle scenario where initial completion list contains only a single non-roslyn item #63083
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists (#62304)" #63082
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] Partition integration tests #63067
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Auto-default ref fields with a null ref-assignment #63065
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" (#62759) #63063
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add option to skip source link and embedded source #63054
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Switch to value-tasks in a few oop syncing points. #63056
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Deregister workspaces from LSP when they are disposed of #63025
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • allow us to build windows tfms on unix #63059
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add threading asserts to rename #63068
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Small pieces of rename serialization cleanup #63066
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. (2) #63028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove a bunch of duplication in our telemetry logging #63033
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Obsolete ITemporaryStorageService public APIs #62998
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix request snapshot bug for languages without an LSP server implementation #63031
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63047
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63052
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63048
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [FabricBot] Automatically close generated PR tagger issues #63040
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Skip failing integration tests #63027
    Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat, Next
  • Rename parameter for clarity #63023
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #62961
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #62854
    Area-IDE
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Add progress bar to document outline window #63011
    Area-IDE
  • Support UnscopedRefAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete parenthesis after 'new' if the type has nested types #63015
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • New hot reload interfaces #60219
    Area-Interactive
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • [Test] Add back support for incremental background analysis for method body editing scenarios #63017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Check the right matches in lambdas #63006
    Area-Interactive
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix SuppressMessage not working on lambdas #62970
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • FindMethodSymbolInType - handle the case when a type definition is resolved to a type in a different module. #62865
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields feature requires ByRefFields runtime flag #62941
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Enable new inline rename by default #62992
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename RequestDelegateFactoryOptions filter property to match builder #43000
    7.0-rc1
  • Follow up to flaky 2.0 retries #42998
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json_nodejs #42997
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #42996
  • Cors not working in Minimal API endpoints #42994
  • Undocumented Blazor Server Side InputFile limit related to SingalR MaximumReceiveMessageSize #42993
  • Data annotation ErrorMessage not working in asp.net core 6 razor pages for DateTime property #42991
  • Blazor JSDisconnectedException on page refresh #42990
  • Lack of useful debug information #42989
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Web Hosting bundle exits with return code 232 #42988
  • `ApiConventionAnalyzer` does not work for `switch` expressions #42987
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, plaintext_actix #42984
  • HTTP/3: Ephemeral port and connection already in use #42982

Closed

  • Don't log exception in exception handling middleware #42950
  • Confirmation email fails after confirmation phone #42985
  • Less allocating `IdentityResult.Failed` overload #42962
  • Access violation/StackoverflowException in new .NET6.0 WebAPI application #42975
  • Quarantine ServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError #41843
    Test failures
  • Query params arrays with empty square bracket notation (HTTP GET) #42921
  • WebAssembly compilation fallback logic is wrong. May need some further docs about configuring memory limits. #42055
    7.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: updates #42952
  • Blazor WASM docker not starting #42964
    Discussions

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grouped CollectionView currently reads out the first item prefaced with "GroupHeaderTemplate" on WinUI #9082
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
  • Shell.FlyoutContent does not update with hot reload (most likely an SDK issue) #9080
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Platform code is not included in Maui class library project #9079
  • ScrollView layout not updating after dynamic change. #9078
  • Build errors on OS with case-sensitive filesystem (MacOSX) #9077
  • FlexLayout trigger Cycle GUI exception #9075
  • RightToLeft: left padding is treated as left, but left margin is treated as right #9074
  • ImageButton IsLoading Property Is Not Set #9073
  • InputTransparent property does not work on Android #9069
  • App Icon for iOS is not created when app icon is not a multiplier by 8 #9067
  • The name property of an element should not contain class names like 'Microsoft.*.*' or 'Windows.*.*' as these are not usually information. #9066
    6.0-sr5
  • Publish Unpackaged Apps Error(Project Reference MAUI Library ) #9064
  • SwipeView causes Shadows to be clipped #9062
  • Crash CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9060
  • [Android] Canvas shadow didn't get applied for the drawn ellipse #9059
  • iOS Debugger Indicates App Has Terminated Immediately #9056

Closed

  • Accessibility Insights for windows - flyout items with shell are wrongly named #8174
    6.0-servicing
  • MAUI App Black out on iPhone device #8904
  • View is overflowing when view parent has padding. #6032
    6.0-servicing
  • MAUI Image not render in Android #8902
  • Changing app icon of .NET MAUI app, then invoking MediaPicker crashes the app #8901
    6.0-servicing
  • Unable to publish .NET MAUI app on Mac - Runtime Identifier error #8893
  • Building .NET MAUI Class Library fails #8897
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat public for .NET 7 #8931
    .NET 7
  • CollectionView seems to reuse images when loading more on Android. #8920
  • NETSDK1032: The RuntimeIdentifier platform "ios-arm64" and the PlatformTarget "x64" must be compatible #9065

PullRequests

Created

  • Force DisableFastUpToDateCheck=false for MAUI repo build #9083
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixes for case-sensitive filesystems #9076
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22373.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22378.2 #9071
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.2 to 0.11.3 #9070
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions public #9038
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9057
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Pin net6 branch #9051
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
